I believe it's April through September

here when you're cooking crab by the way

corner these two back corners right

what's left these are the gills of the

after what you're going to do is you're

what you can do is you're going to peel
away the shell and you should be left

use one of these nifty little these are
like seafood Forks or you could use a

as you can all of the lump crabmeat from
inside these little pockets here now
sometimes you might have to crack this
half into another half and by the way
the reason I'm not using a mallet to do
this is because what will happen if you
use a mallet what you're going to do is

I like to do it on both sides so I'm

and you should be able to peel the shell

it may take you a little bit of time to
